name: Place_GetByType
description: Gets all places of a given type

types.description:
A comma-separated list of the types to return. Max. approx 12 types.
            A valid list of place types can be obtained from the /Place/Meta/placeTypes endpoint.

activeOnly.description: An optional parameter to limit the results to active records only (Currently only the 'VariableMessageSign' place type is supported)

$ul: **additionalProperties**: A bag of additional key/value pairs with extra information about this place.
**distance**: The distance of the place from its search point, if this is the result
**placeType**: The type of Place. See /Place/Meta/placeTypes for possible values.
**url**: The unique location of this resource.
